hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EBCD.EBCD_ID, EBCD.EBCD_QUICK_CODE, EBCD.EBCD_CODE, EBCD.EBCD_NAME_EN, EBCD.EBCD_NAME_CN, EBCD.EBCD_SQUENCE_NO from EB_CODE_MASTER EBCD where EBCD.EBCD_STATUS = 1 --状态 1=标识正常 2=标识删除 AND EBCD.EBCD_DICTIONARY_TYPE = :ebcdDictionaryType order by EBCD.EBCD_SQUENCE_NO
